item.title: Rubio dismisses criticism over US response to Myanmar quake
item.description: The US has been accused of not doing enough to help Myanmar due to the shuttering of its humanitarian aid agency.

item.title: Trump extends deadline to keep TikTok running in US
item.description: The president has granted the app a second 75-day extension to comply with a law that requires it to either sell its US assets or face a ban.

item.title: Trump's agenda grapples with political and economic reality
item.description: Trump says itâ€™s all going to plan but stock market turmoil plus struggles at home and abroad show how hard it is to deliver as president.

item.title: Spain tackles housing 'social emergency' as rents double in a decade
item.description: The Spanish government is moving to make renting more affordable and boost the supply of homes.

item.title: Trump's tariffs could be death knell for US-Africa trade pact
item.description: Some African countries got privileged access to US markets, but the future of that deal is uncertain.
